name: Hyundai Tucson
description: The price of Hyundai Tucson, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 29.02  - 35.94 Lakh. It is available in 8 variants, with engine options ranging from 1997 to 1999 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. Tucson comes with 6 airbags. Hyundai Tucson is available in 7 colours.

variants.variant_name: Tucson Platinum 2.0 AT Petrol 1999 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 154 bhp
